languages.text: Кто-то наспех начертал портрет рабочего в красной повязке — все еще пахнет химкрасителями. Судя по слою облезшей краски, его не раз затирали.

Someone has sketched a hasty portrait of a worker with a red scarf over his face. The artwork still reeks of chemical pigment. Judging by the layer of flaked-off paint, it has been removed several times already.
languages.original_text: Кто-то наспех начертал портрет рабочего в красной повязке — все еще пахнет химкрасителями. Судя по слою облезшей краски, его не раз затирали.

traits.locale_text: There's a hastily sketched portrait of a worker in a red headband, still smelling of chemical pigment. Judging by the layer of flaked-off paint, the artwork has been erased more than once before.
There's a hastily sketched portrait of a worker in a red headband, still smelling of chemical pigment. Judging by the layer of flaked-off paint, the artwork has been erased more than once before.

Someone has sketched a hasty portrait of a worker with a red scarf over his face. The artwork still reeks of chemical pigment. Judging by the layer of flaked-off paint, it has been removed several times already.

Someone has sketched a hasty portrait of a worker with a red scarf over his face. The artwork still reeks of chemical pigment. Judging by the layer of flaked-off paint, it has been removed several times already.

languages.text: Alguien ha esbozado un retrato apresurado de un trabajador con la cara cubierta por una bufanda roja. La obra aún apesta a pigmento químico. A juzgar por la capa de pintura raspada, ya lo han borrado varias veces.
languages.original_text: Someone has sketched a hasty portrait of a worker with a red scarf over his face. The artwork still reeks of chemical pigment. Judging by the layer of flaked-off paint, it has been removed several times already.

traits.locale_text: Alguien ha esbozado un retrato apresurado de un trabajador con la cara cubierta por una bufanda roja. La obra aún apesta a pigmento químico. A juzgar por la capa de pintura raspada, ya lo han borrado varias veces.

languages.text: 誰かが赤いスカーフを顔に巻いた労働者のポートレートを素早くスケッチしていた。作品からは、まだ科学顔料の臭いがする。剥がれ落ちた絵の具の層から判断すると、すでに何度か剝がされているようだ。
languages.original_text: Someone has sketched a hasty portrait of a worker with a red scarf over his face. The artwork still reeks of chemical pigment. Judging by the layer of flaked-off paint, it has been removed several times already.

traits.locale_text: 誰かが赤いスカーフを顔に巻いた労働者のポートレートを素早くスケッチしていた。作品からは、まだ科学顔料の臭いがする。剥がれ落ちた絵の具の層から判断すると、すでに何度か剝がされているようだ。

languages.text: 有人用潦草的笔迹画了一幅工人的肖像，工人脸上围着红色的斗篷。这幅画仍然散发着化学颜料的味道，从脱落的油漆层来看，这幅画已经被清除过好几次了。
languages.original_text: Someone has sketched a hasty portrait of a worker with a red scarf over his face. The artwork still reeks of chemical pigment. Judging by the layer of flaked-off paint, it has been removed several times already.

traits.locale_text: 有人用潦草的笔迹画了一幅工人的肖像，工人脸上围着红色的斗篷。这幅画仍然散发着化学颜料的味道，从脱落的油漆层来看，这幅画已经被清除过好几次了。

languages.text: Jemand hat hastig das Porträt eines Arbeiters mit einem roten Tuch vor dem Gesicht skizziert. Das Werk riecht noch nach chemischen Pigmenten. Der abgeblätterten Farbe nach zu schließen, wurde sie schon mehrmals entfernt.
languages.original_text: Someone has sketched a hasty portrait of a worker with a red scarf over his face. The artwork still reeks of chemical pigment. Judging by the layer of flaked-off paint, it has been removed several times already.

traits.locale_text: Jemand hat hastig das Porträt eines Arbeiters mit einem roten Tuch vor dem Gesicht skizziert. Das Werk riecht noch nach chemischen Pigmenten. Der abgeblätterten Farbe nach zu schließen, wurde sie schon mehrmals entfernt.

languages.text: Quelqu'un a dessiné à la hâte le portrait d'un ouvrier au visage couvert par un foulard rouge. L'œuvre empeste encore les pigments chimiques. À en juger par la couche de peinture écaillée, elle a déjà été effacée plusieurs fois.
languages.original_text: Someone has sketched a hasty portrait of a worker with a red scarf over his face. The artwork still reeks of chemical pigment. Judging by the layer of flaked-off paint, it has been removed several times already.

traits.locale_text: Quelqu'un a dessiné à la hâte le portrait d'un ouvrier au visage couvert par un foulard rouge. L'œuvre empeste encore les pigments chimiques. À en juger par la couche de peinture écaillée, elle a déjà été effacée plusieurs fois.

languages.text: Birisi, yüzüne kırmızı bir atkı dolayan bir işçinin kabataslak portresini çizmiş. Çizimden hâlâ kimyasal pigmentlerin leş gibi kokusu yayılıyor. Pul pul ayrılıp düşen boyanın katmanlarına bakılırsa hâlihazırda defalarca kazınmış.
languages.original_text: Someone has sketched a hasty portrait of a worker with a red scarf over his face. The artwork still reeks of chemical pigment. Judging by the layer of flaked-off paint, it has been removed several times already.
